DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether add motivational interviewing ( MI ) behavioural weight loss program ( BWLP ) result improve weight loss adult overweight obese .
DOC.brief_title: Does Motivational Interviewing Improve Behavioral Weight Loss Outcomes Obesity ?
DOC.detailed_description: Although behavioural weight loss program ( BWLP ) typically first line treatment obesity , often plague high attrition rate poor adherence . Studies evaluate benefit add motivational interviewing ( MI ) BWLPs yield mixed finding . The main purpose randomize control trial ass efficacy add MI BWLP weight loss adherence outcomes among 135 overweight obese individual enrol 12-week ( 24 session ) BWLP . This study use randomize , control , longitudinal , between-subjects design investigate effect two-session MI intervention weight loss participant enrol BWLP . Patients receive either two 45-60 minute MI intervention two 45-60 minute attention control interview . The control group interview consist question ascertain weight history , diet history , dietary awareness physical activity . Questions control group focus primarily assessment past behaviour whereas question MI group focus enhance motivation explore resolve ambivalence . Weight measure baseline , end BWLP , 6 month follow BWLP completion . Program adherence ( measure number BWLP session attend 24 ) assess secondary dependent measure . Importance , readiness , confidence weight change assess baseline immediately follow interview ( either MI control ) . In addition , several secondary outcome measure assess baseline , end BWLP , 1 month follow-up , 6 month follow-up . Research personnel inform BWLP participant study initial BWLP group intake assessment , occur prior commencement formal BWLP . Individuals express interest participating contact phone research assistant screen eligibility . If eligible , appointment make first MI/control session schedule within first two week BWLP . Randomization occur immediately prior interview . Participants contact 10th week BWLP schedule second MI/control session , occur approximately 12th week program . Participants contact several week follow program completion schedule one-month follow-up assessment . Finally , participant contact approximately five month follow program completion order schedule six-month follow-up assessment . Sessions tape record participant quality assurance purpose . A subset tape use assess treatment integrity .
DOC.criteria: Overweight obese ( BMI great equal 25 kilogram per meter square ) . Pregnancy ( intention become pregnant within 9 month ) Health issue would preclude participation physical activity Concurrent involvement another weight loss program .
